text: Beaune is a commune in Bourgogne-Franche-Comté in the Côte-d'Or department. It is the region's wine capital. == Twin towns == * Nantucket, United States * Malmedy, Belgium * Krems an der Donau, Austria * Bensheim, Germany * Kōshū, Japan Category:Communes in Côte-d'Or Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Beaune
